channel.title: CVE Feed for Jeroen Sormani -- WP Dashboard Notes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jeroen Sormani -- WP Dashboard Notes

item.title: CVE-2024-43226|2024-08-13T14:57:12.657Z -- jeroen%20sormani -- wp%20dashboard%20notes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeroen Sormani WP Dashboard Notes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Dashboard Notes: from n/a through 1.0.11.
